Docs.summary: Thrown when a crypto error occurs while queueing a secure input buffer.

Docs.summary: This indicates that the video frame being decrypted exceeds the size of the device's protected output buffers.

Docs.summary: This indicates that decryption was attempted on a session that is not opened, which could be due to a failure to open the session, closing the session prematurely, or the session being reclaimed by the resource manager.

Docs.summary: This indicates that an operation was attempted that could not be supported by the crypto system of the device in its current configuration.
